title: Bug 6322: All Types Dialog Shows Obfuscated Classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (such as 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', and 'd') which are currently displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
OB: Currently, the obfuscated classes are displayed prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be displayed less prominently in the Open Type dialog.
